content.raw:
If running sandisland instead of vrx, rviz will show no image for cameras because there are no cameras. This is normal.

‌

Also, the link starts as odom, but there is no odom link, so the boat starts white. You can change it to base\_link and you will see the boat with all its meshes.
content.html:
If running sandisland instead of vrx, rviz will show no image for cameras because there are no cameras. This is normal.

‌

Also, the link starts as odom, but there is no odom link, so the boat starts white. You can change it to base_link and you will see the boat with all its meshes.
